attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app... ALL my apps and stuff stopped working I had to restart my phone and some apps still struggle. This app is glitchy and I do not recommend damaging your phone by downloading this 😌

The app keeps glitching back and fourth between tik tok with a 🚫 over it and an orange screen. I definitely do not recommend this app as it is so glitchy and just a waste of storage. Also who needs an app for 2020 🙄

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review:
This app is terrible it never loads and it always crashes and it takes up
Lots of space on my phone and it also just sends me random notifications

I am disgusted by this app he should be in prison he raped so many people but no he is racist he says make America great again it’s more like make America white again I would never vote for him I would rather have Kanye as president then him.

attributes.title: Unfair
attributes.review: It doesn’t allow people like me (who don’t want to give them their phone number) to put in an email address to sign up. I will now not be voting for trump in the up coming election

attributes.title: An horrible app
attributes.review: When i downloaded and it asked for my number, i started to get tones of scam  called for no reason! And spam texts! I suggest not to get the app if your don’t like getting tons of spam!

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: I got a virus somehow and it was showing me strange porno unexceptional this app needs to be fixed i have had so many bad problems took a couple hours to install I can’t with this

attributes.title: Super annoyed
attributes.review: As soon as I opened I saw a racist and a pedo I was terrified and it triggered my anxiety I do not believe this app should even be allowed on the App Store there are kids who are on her you know !!! Someone definitely needs to get rid of this orange freak

attributes.title: Worst app ever🤢
attributes.review: It took forever to download and made my phone glitch the whole time I had it. Literally the worst app ever. The information on it isn’t even that accurate. Don’t download it!!!

attributes.title: Do not download this app it’s trash
attributes.review: First it took forever to download then don’t get me started with the viruses it put on here and took all my contacts out of here every gone so do not waste your time
